tasks.label: Run Game with VNC
tasks.command: sudo apt update && sudo apt install -y novnc && Xvfb :99 -screen 0 1280x720x24 & sleep 2 && export DISPLAY=:99 && x11vnc -display :99 -forever -shared -rfbport 5900 -nopw & sleep 2 && websockify --web /usr/share/novnc/ 6080 localhost:5900 & sleep 2 && ./build/MansionHorror
